section.p: In the following table, the percentages of the Dutch population age structure for the years 1950-2010 are listed, divided into nine age classes (source: CBS).
Create from this data, the next chart.

section.title: Solution
section.p:
Create the chart as follows:
Select the whole table and start with creating chart type Line with markers.
To get the year numbers on the category axis choose tab Design Switch Row/Column (group Data) .
For the indication of the data source choose tab Layout Text Box (group Insert) , draw the box, and enter the text.
Format the values on the vertical axis as percentages without decimals.
